在回调函数中监听行选择相关事件。.en-us: Listen to row selection related events in callback functions.

设置参数selectedRowsSyncWithData=True后，针对表格数.en-us: After setting selectedRowsSyncWithData=True, updates to the table data source will synchronize the selectedRows based on the current selectedRowKeys (ensure each row in the original data has a unique key).

设置参数sticky=True后，针对高度超过视口高度的表格，将在浏览表格时自动.en-us: When sticky=True is set, a table that exceeds the viewport height will automatically have a sticky header.

通过参数titlePopoverInfo为对应字段快捷添加额外说明信息。.en-us: Quickly add extra explanatory information for fields using titlePopoverInfo.

通过参数columnsFormatConstraint为对应字段配合单元格编辑模.en-us: Use columnsFormatConstraint to apply regex validation rules for fields in cell edit mode.

文本域编辑模式下，enter键的按下将不会退出当前输入框，而是会进行换行。.en-us: In text area edit mode, pressing enter does not exit the input but inserts a newline.

基于单个字段进行排序。.en-us: Sort based on a single field.

基于多个字段的固定顺序进行组合排序。.en-us: Sort based on a fixed order combination of multiple fields.

设置参数'multiple': 'auto'后，多字段组合排序的字段优先级顺序将.en-us: After setting multiple: 'auto', the priority order for multi-field combination sorting will dynamically follow the user's click sequence.

通过参数showSorterTooltip、showSorterTooltipT.en-us: Control extra information tooltips for sortable column headers using showSorterTooltip and showSorterTooltipTarget.

通过回调函数监听排序事件。.en-us: Listen to sorting events via callback functions.

为字段筛选功能设置默认选中项。.en-us: Set default selected options for field filtering.

通过关键词搜索进行字段筛选。.en-us: Filter fields by searching with keywords.

分页控件的不同显示位置。.en-us: Different display positions for pagination controls.

控制每页显示的最大记录数量。.en-us: Control the maximum number of records displayed per page.

允许用户调整每页记录数.en-us: Allow User to Adjust Records per Page

渲染控件供用户调整每页显示的最大记录数量。.en-us: Render controls to allow users to adjust the maximum records per page.

渲染控件供用户输入页码进行快捷跳页。.en-us: Render controls for quick page jumping by entering a page number.

单页自动隐藏控件.en-us: Auto Hide Controls on Single Page

单页数据时自动隐藏分页相关控件。.en-us: Automatically hide pagination controls when there's only one page.

渲染简洁风格的分页控件。.en-us: Render pagination controls in a simple style.

以禁用状态显示分页控件。.en-us: Display pagination controls in a disabled state.

在表格底部渲染总结栏。.en-us: Render a summary bar at the bottom of the table.

将总结栏固定在表格底部。.en-us: Fix the summary bar at the bottom of the table.

将总结栏固定在表格顶部。.en-us: Fix the summary bar at the top of the table.

通过参数summaryRowBlankColumns为总结行设置前缀占位空列数量.en-us: Use summaryRowBlankColumns to set leading empty columns for the summary row; useful when row selection is enabled.

配合多层表头使用总结栏。.en-us: Use the summary bar with multi-level headers.

通过参数conditionalStyleFuncs对指定字段进行单元格条件样式渲.en-us: Apply conditional cell style rules for specific fields using conditionalStyleFuncs.

通过参数defaultExpandedRowKeys控制初始化需要处于展开状态的.en-us: Control which rows are expanded by default using defaultExpandedRowKeys.

设置参数expandRowByClick=True后，点击整行即可触发行展开。.en-us: Expand a row by clicking on it when expandRowByClick=True is set.

通过参数enableCellClickListenColumns设置需要启用单元.en-us: Enable cell click event listening for specific fields using enableCellClickListenColumns.

设置参数enableHoverListen=True后开启表格内部鼠标移入事件监.en-us: Enable mouse enter event listening within the table by setting enableHoverListen=True.

设置参数emptyContent自定义空数据提示内容。.en-us: Customize the empty data prompt using emptyContent.

局部容器内悬浮层显示矫正.en-us: Adjust Floating Layer Display in Local Containers

与表格部分功能有关的悬浮层控件，譬如字段筛选对应的下拉菜单等，默认是以页面根节点.en-us: For floating layer controls (e.g., dropdown menus for field filtering) that by default use the page root as the scroll container, set containerId='localContainerId' to optimize their position when the table is inside a local container.

在定义参数data时可通过键值对属性children向下嵌套展示行记录。.en-us: Display nested row records by using the children property when defining the data parameter.
